metadata.synopsis: Wulbren's push for the player to move on and finally begin their approach to taking High Hall
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the group when entering the houseEnter dialogue with Wulbren

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.text: Once the city is saved, we'll rebuild it better than ever. With Ironhand invention at its very foundation.

1.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
1.text: Prepare yourself - our arsenal will be yours to command.
